text.div:
Affected Status

An enumeration used to represent whether a person is affected by a condition of interest in the context of a pedigree.

This code system http://ga4gh.org/fhir/phenopackets/CodeSystem/affected-status defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
missing MissingIt is unknown whether the person is affected by the condition
unaffected UnaffectedPerson is unaffected by the condition
Affected AffectedPerson is affected by the condition

name: AffectedStatus
title: Affected Status
publisher: Global Alliance for Genomics and Health
description: An enumeration used to represent whether a person is affected by a condition of interest in the context of a pedigree.

concept.definition: It is unknown whether the person is affected by the condition
Person is unaffected by the condition
Person is affected by the condition
